def word_to_bin(word):
    return ['{:08b}'.format(ord(c)) for c in word]

def word_to_bin(word):
    return [format(ord(c), '08b') for c in word]

def word_to_bin(word):
    return ["{:0>8b}".format(ord(c)) for c in word]

def word_to_bin(word):
    return [ f"{ord(c):08b}" for c in word ]

def word_to_bin(s):
    return [f"{ord(x):08b}" for x in s]

def word_to_bin(s):
    return ["{0:08b}".format(ord(c)) for c in s]

def word_to_bin(w):
    return [format(ord(c),'08b') for c in w]

def word_to_bin(w):
    return [f"{bin(ord(c))[2:]:0>8}" for c in w]

def word_to_bin(s):
    return list(map(lambda x: format(ord(x),'08b'),s))
